channel.title: Flotsam: Adrift Among the Stars - Stellar Jetsam
channel.description:
**Flotsam: Adrift Among the Stars** Play as outcasts, renegades and misfits living in the belly of a space station, in the shadow of a more prosperous society.
The game is GMless and diceless (as part of the Belonging Outside Belonging framework), with rules that point your characters at each other and bring their relationships into sharp focus. We will create a unique setting while we play
**Wednesdays in February. 7:30-10:30 PM EST**
[date=2021-02-04 time=19:30:00 timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2021-02-04 time=22:30:00 timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 1](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MOmnMuEinOzxTcUp-N7) [date=2021-02-11 time=19:30:00 timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2021-02-11 time=22:30:00 timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 2](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MOmnRlZ_llYxSBVivqj) [date=2021-02-18 time=19:30:00 timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2021-02-15 time=22:30:00 timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 3](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MOmnZ4z_E8XU9QKa9n_) [date=2021-02-22 time=19:30:00 timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2021-02-22 time=22:30:00 timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 4](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MOmnfYyd_MkkxAZpY4h)
